Banner.Description: I have 1+ years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in React JS MaterialUI and applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 1 + years as a developer, I sought to train every day. I have worked on React Js, Redux, MaterialUI, Bootstrap, writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covered backend developer roles with MySQL. I have led teams having empathy, motivating to partners, and collaboratively setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer
Description: Developed and maintained a web-based application using HTML, CSS, SCSS and Javascript, resulting in improved user experience and increased performance.
Designed and implemented multiple Plugin's to support multiple applications, using Angular Libraries.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Worked in team of 3 people in the development of a E-Retail Cloud based solution, Abbas Law, Ready to Munch.
Used Git, AWS Codecommit for Version Controlling.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Independent
Description: Implementing continuous improvements, working on frontend and backend.
Creating platforms with HTML, CSS  and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Automation of processes with data structures.
Design layout with SASS, Bootstrap, Materialize, Prime Faces, etc.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: E-Retail Point Pharmacy
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A Next Generation Cloud based E-Retail System application made from scratch with Micro Frontend Technologie's, role based setting's and user management.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: E-Retail Point Website
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: E-Retail Point is a Point of sale (POS) solution where you can manage all of your business's administrative, management and financial tasks. E-Retail Point can also track sales trends and handle transaction.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Ready To Munch
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Ready to Munch offers a long and detailed list of the best restaurants nearby with menu items at the same restaurants' price, with no extra fee available to order food Online with home delivery and takeaway options.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: The Abbas Law
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: We provide our clients with legal services in Canadian immigration, tax , and related areas. We advise our clients on their legal rights, duties, and options under Canadian laws.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: SMSAMI
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Transform your business with digital IT workflows. Modernize your operations to optimize productivity, cost and resilience with a single platform for IT

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Chatloop
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page app which connect with your friend!.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Portfolio

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
